name: Easy Lite Preloader
author: Jerome Angeles

sections.description:
Easy lite preloader – add a fully customizable, responsive and lightweight preloader plugin for your wordpress. Compatible with mobile phones like androids, iphones and most browsers such as Google Chrome, FireFox, Safari, Opera, Microsoft Edge, Internet Explorer, etc.

  • No coding required
  • Fully Customizable
  • Show preloader on selected pages (including post pages) or on entire website
  • Customizable background, image, image size, text, text colors and font size
  • Responsive – Supports mobile devices and tablets
  • Preview preloader on configuration settings

Want to create or customize your website?
Contact me here

Plugin Your Might Like
Easy Floating Social Buttons
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the Plugins screen in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin on Appearance -> EL Preloader
